name: Overbank Flow Frequency
functionStatement: Peak flows reshape channel without chronic instability, redistribute wood and sediment, reset habitats, and supply nutrients to floodplains.
descriptionMarkdown: Moderate floods (~1-2 yr) overtop banks unless valley is naturally confined.

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Benches rarely or never wet. Levees or incision isolate the floodplain except during extremes.
Criteria: Activation rare except large floods

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Only larger, less frequent events reach benches. Benches are dusty or vegetated with upland species.
Criteria: Activation ~5-10 yr

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Benches inundated in a few recent years but not consistently.
Criteria: Activation ~3-5 yr

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Recent moderate events inundate low benches and side bars. Field stakes at bankfull are inundated about every other year.
Criteria: Floodplain activation ~1-2 yr
